title: Puff pastry pizza bites
description: Bite-size pizzas with puff pastry bases make perfect party food. Here are two simple topping ideas to try.Can you eat well for less this Christmas? Take the test
ingredients: 2 x 320g packs ready-rolled all-butter puff pastry
1 x 125g pack of mini-mozzarella balls, drained and quartered
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
